metadata.title: CVE-2024-35950 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/client: Fully protect modes[] with dev->mode_config.mutex The modes[]array contains pointers to modes on the connectors' mode lists, which areprotected by dev->mode_config.mutex. Thus we need to extend modes[] thesame protection or by the time we use it the elements may already bepointing to freed/reused memory.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
